Nettie Pearl Maynard

  1. Foster Name: Jeanette P.
  2. Foster Family: Unknown
  3. Location of Family: Wood River, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wood River, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1915
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Jean P. Carney
  10. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 394-398; National Orphan Train Complex.
